Package com.linecorp.armeria.server

Server core.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PathMapping
    Matches the absolute path part of a URI and translates the matched path to another path string.
    ServerListener
    Listens to life cycle events of a Server.
    Service
    Handles a request received by a Server.
    ServiceCodec
    Decodes a ByteBuf into an invocation and encodes the result produced by ServiceInvocationHandler into a ByteBuf.
    ServiceCodec.DecodeResult
    The result of ServiceCodec.decodeRequest().
    ServiceInvocationHandler
    Handles the invocation request decoded by a ServiceCodec.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPathMapping
    A skeletal PathMapping implementation.
    DecoratingService
    A Service that decorates another Service.
    DecoratingServiceCodec
    A ServiceCodec that decorates another ServiceCodec.
    DecoratingServiceInvocationHandler
    A ServiceInvocationHandler that decorates another ServiceInvocationHandler.
    PathMapped<T>
    A value mapped by PathMappings.
    PathMappings<T>
    Maps a request path to a value associated with a matching PathMapping.
    Server
    Listens to ServerPorts and delegates client requests to Services.
    ServerBuilder
    Builds a new Server and its ServerConfig.
    ServerConfig
    Server configuration.
    ServerListenerAdapter
    A skeletal ServerListener implementation to minimize the effort to implement this interface.
    ServerPort
    A pair of server-side bind address and SessionProtocol.
    ServiceCallbackInvoker
    A helper class that invokes the callback methods in Service, ServiceCodec and ServiceInvocationHandler.
    ServiceCodec.DefaultDecodeResult
    The default ServiceCodec.DecodeResult implementation.
    ServiceConfig
    A Service and its PathMapping and VirtualHost.
    SimpleService
    A simple Service.
    VirtualHost
    A name-based virtual host.
    VirtualHostBuilder
    Builds a new VirtualHost.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServiceCodec.DecodeResultType
    Whether ServiceCodec.decodeRequest() has succeeded or not.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RequestDecodeException
    A RuntimeException raised when ServiceCodec.decodeRequest() failed to decode an invocation request.
    RequestTimeoutException
    A TimeoutException raised when a received request has not been processed within timeout.
    ServiceNotFoundException
    A RuntimeException raised when a Service failed to find a ServiceInvocationHandler that can handle an invocation request.
    ServiceUnavailableException
    A RuntimeException that is raised when a requested invocation cannot be served.

Package com.linecorp.armeria.server Description

Server core.

Starting points

  • VirtualHostBuilder
  • Service
